title: Who's more fun to play Zed or Leona?
body: Due to the PROJECT SKINS coming out I'm stuck between deciding what champ to get. I don't really care much about win ratesb ut just simply who will be more fun to play even if I play them for 6 rounds straight. Also if they can play other roles instead of just mid and support that would be great info.

I don't think any of these guys meant that Leona is GOOD at Top or Jungle. They merely said she was FUN in said roles. I don't think they ever meant for anyone to try it in Ranked play. Chill.

I'd say that Zed is more fun to play.

Sure, I can't play him very well (I think I had something like a 1.5:1 ratio in norms) but I just find him more interesting to play.
00:04:1 would be the "kda" on sites such as op.gg if that's your ratio

(YASUO) has project skin, can play mid top jg sup and adc (universal (^｡^)) And he is fun when you get a hold of his style (which is actually harder than most "people" think, he requires real skill to use well, getting lucky 1 game against bad teams don't count, so what if you had a team built around you and learnt the basic of pressing r, there is more to it than that)

I'm not sold on top/jungle Leona tbh. I think you must just be having success with it because you're outskilling your opponents but since Leona scales pretty badly into the late game since you rely on a W->E->auto->Q or somewhat of a similar fashion. If you W then E to dash out and they happen to dodge that E evade you just long enough to re engage so that your W damage sets off then you are down two skills similarly to alistar when fail combo = 2 skills wasted and poor scaling i think it is okay but definitely due to its low scaling would be outclassed by well just about anything top lane with multiple stuns with better scaling and less reliance on some sort of combo burst. however Zed top's seem to do fine some of the time? Idk.

As for most fun champion. Leona is about the lowest skillcap champion that i still enjoy playing theres just something so rewarding about timing your stuns together so well that they are in a seemingly perma stun. But I've not tried Zed and I imagine him to be fun but I think if I were to pick up an assassin at this point Echo seems a little more fun to me and AD mid's in solo queue always seem to go sour when you have a full ad team just saying.

Leona aka Bae-ona
Really depends on your play style tho
If you prefer obliterating your opponent then go Zed, or if you prefer being an unkillable wall with cray amounts of CC go Leona

Also as far as I know they're only really good at there specified lanes, I could see a Leona top probs going pretty well though
